City Council
============

Physical Address:

City Hall  
300 N. Loraine  
Midland, TX 79701

Phone:

[432-685-7204](tel:4326857204)

Link: [City Council Page](https://www.midlandtexas.gov/238)  
  

(Note: Council Members do not physically office out of City Hall.)
